noviceFeatures.title: Academic
noviceFeatures.text: When researching information in a library or another collection of knowledge you can roll with Fortune's Favor.

noviceFeatures.title: Aid
noviceFeatures.text: Add an additional +2 to tests when helping an ally.

noviceFeatures.title: Artisan
noviceFeatures.text: Gain training in one set of artisan's tools (Woodworking, masonry, weaving, etc.)

noviceFeatures.title: Athletic
noviceFeatures.text: Add +3 to mettle tests for feats of strength or endurance.

noviceFeatures.title: Daring
noviceFeatures.text: On 3 tests per R&R, instead of rolling dice, flip a coin. If you win the flip, you pass the test. Otherwise, you fail.

noviceFeatures.title: Disguise Master
noviceFeatures.text: Add +3 to tests to disguise yourself as another humanoid.

noviceFeatures.title: Imitator
noviceFeatures.text: Add +3 to tests when trying to imitate another humanoid's speech.

noviceFeatures.title: Independent
noviceFeatures.text: Once per day, when you make a non-combat test without help, add +3 to the results.

noviceFeatures.title: Infiltrator
noviceFeatures.text: Add +3 to stealth tests.

noviceFeatures.title: Insightful
noviceFeatures.text: Add +3 to heart tests to determine if someone is lying to you or to determine their intentions.

noviceFeatures.title: Keen Eyed
noviceFeatures.text: Add +3 to heart tests to spot hidden objects and creatures.

noviceFeatures.title: Knowledgeable
noviceFeatures.text: When you take this feature pick a subject from the list below that you are well versed in. When you take Tests that rely on this knowledge, add a +3 to the roll.

noviceFeatures.title: Linguist
noviceFeatures.text: Learn another language. Add a +3 to intellect tests to decipher languages and codes you don't already know.

noviceFeatures.title: Long Jumper
noviceFeatures.text: Increase your jump distance by 5ft.

noviceFeatures.title: Medical Training
noviceFeatures.text: When you an intellect test to heal a dying ally, make the roll with Fortune's Favor.

noviceFeatures.title: Performer
noviceFeatures.text: Add +3 to tests to determine the quality of your performance art. Gain training in one performance art of your choice (1 musical instrument, dance, acrobatics, etc.)

noviceFeatures.title: Reliable Skill
noviceFeatures.text: When you make a non-combat test, before you roll, you can choose to treat the test as though you rolled a 12. You can do this 3 times per R&R.

noviceFeatures.title: Silver Tongued
noviceFeatures.text: When you make a heart test to convince others with emotional appeal, add a +3 to the test.

noviceFeatures.title: Swift
noviceFeatures.text: Increase your speed by 10ft.

noviceFeatures.title: Swift Climber
noviceFeatures.text: Increase your climb speed by 5ft.

noviceFeatures.title: Swift Swimmer
noviceFeatures.text: Increase your swim speed by 5ft.

noviceFeatures.title: Trekker
noviceFeatures.text: Double your lift, drag, and pack capacity.
